SEARCH
Package PharmacySystem

Class MedicationTracking

java.lang.Object
PharmacySystem.MedicationTracking
public class MedicationTracking extends Object
The MedicationTracking class manages doctors, patients, medications, and prescriptions in the pharmacy system. It provides methods for adding, editing, deleting, searching, assigning, and generating reports for these entities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MedicationTracking()
    Constructs a MedicationTracking system and initializes sample data.

      Edits the details of a medication identified by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the medication to edit.
      newName - The new name for the medication.
      newDose - The new dosage for the medication.
      newQty - The new quantity in stock for the medication.
      newExpiry - The new expiry date for the medication.

    • acceptPrescription

      public void acceptPrescription(String id, Doctor doctor, Patient patient, Medication medication, String dateString)
      Accepts a new prescription and adds it to the system after validating inputs.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the prescription.
      doctor - The doctor issuing the prescription.
      patient - The patient receiving the prescription.
      medication - The medication prescribed.
      dateString - The date the prescription was issued in YYYY-MM-DD format.

    • restockMedication

      public void restockMedication(String medicationName, int quantity)
      Restocks a medication by name and prints the result.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - The name of the medication to restock.
      quantity - The quantity to add to stock.
